data.label: 团结引擎
data.description: 团结引擎是 Unity 中国研发团队推出的 Unity 中国版引擎，它以 Unity 2022 LTS 为研发基础，推出了微信小游戏解决方案、团结引擎车机版，赋予小游戏和智能汽车领域的开发者，以更强劲的创作动能，是 Unity 中国加速本土化进程的里程碑。

data.label: Tuanjie Engine
data.description: Tuanjie Engine is the Unity China version of the engine launched by the Unity China R&D team. Based on the Unity 2022 LTS as the R&D foundation, it has launched the Weixin MiniGame Solution and the Tuanjie Engine Car Edition, which empowers developers in the field of MiniGames and smart cars with stronger creative momentum, and is a milestone in accelerating the localization process of Unity China.
